## Version 1.0.0.0-release - `<Archival>` edition

* Released
  * 23 Dec 2018
  * for Kerbal Space Program 1.8.1
  * by [zer0Kerbal](https://github.com/zer0Kerbal)

<div style="border:0.5px solid Tomato; background-color: #bada55; color: #FF0000; text-align:center"><h4>
<b>For best results - DO A CLEAN INSTALL; DELETE EXISTING INSTALLATION THEN RE-INSTALL</b></h4><p>Download only from <a href="https://www.curseforge.com/kerbal/ksp-mods/ExpanseFactions/files">CurseForge</a></p></div>

### Changes

* no changelog provided
